mapper.select:
select
distinct
'True' as QUERYID,
from CLT_CLT_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}

select cltno,chinesename
from clt_clt_info where chinesename like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{cltname}), '%')

update CLT_CLT_INFO
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLTNO = #{cltno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TREENO = #{treeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHINESENAME = #{chinesename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABBREVIATION = #{abbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPBANK = #{opbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACNTNO = #{acntno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERNETSITE = #{internetsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSSADDR = #{bussaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPINCHARGE = #{depincharge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DAYOFESTB = #{dayofestb,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INDUSTRY = #{industry,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RANKING = #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORGCODE = #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANTYPE = #{finantype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LISENSENO = #{lisenseno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAXREGNO = #{taxregno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOANNO = #{loanno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPRATETERM = #{oprateterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FERC = #{ferc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSSSCOPE = #{bussscope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGCAPITAL = #{regcapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUR = #{cur,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REGADDR = #{regaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGALPERZIP = #{legalperzip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGALPER = #{legalper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGALPERID = #{legalperid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGALPERPHONE = #{legalperphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDITLEVEL = #{creditlevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EVALAUTH = #{evalauth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVALTIME = #{evaltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREDITRATING = #{creditrating,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXTCLTNO = #{extcltno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISLISTED = #{islisted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AREA = #{area,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COUNTRYCODE = #{countrycode,jdbcType=CHAR},
INGROUP = #{ingroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATURE = #{nature,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CORPTYPE = #{corptype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CORSUBTYPE = #{corsubtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OTHER = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANKNO = #{bankno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STAUTS = #{stauts,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CAUSE = #{cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENTERPRISESCALE = #{enterprisescale,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LICENSECODE = #{licensecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCIALCODE = #{financialcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLTSTATE = #{cltstate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCIALCONTACT = #{financialcontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENDDATE = #{enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STOCKCODE = #{stockcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SITEAREA = #{sitearea,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SITETITLE = #{sitetitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEESNUM = #{employeesnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TAXNUM = #{taxnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LANDTAXNUM = #{landtaxnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCTSMAJOR = #{productsmajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LISTEDPLACE = #{listedplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTRICT = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BORRNATURE = #{borrnature,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MECCODE = #{meccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECTNAME = #{projectname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANTYATTRIBUTE = #{compantyattribute,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REGIONTEXT = #{regiontext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEFTFIG_N3 = #{leftfigN3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RIGHTFIG_N3 = #{rightfigN3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPT_TYPE = #{deptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_PARENT_ID = #{orgParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLEGROUPID = #{rolegroupid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FINA_PRINCIPAL = #{finaPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIMARY_ACC_NO = #{primaryAccNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PERSON = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYNC_FLAG = #{syncFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SYNC_VERSION = #{syncVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUTH_BY_USER_FLAG = #{authByUserFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGENCY_NO = #{agencyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORG_ORDER = #{orgOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_LEVEL = #{orgLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGCLASSID = #{orgclassid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INSTICREDITCODE = #{insticreditcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGNUMCODE = #{regnumcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPRONUM = #{appronum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGTYPEDETAIL = #{orgtypedetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BCOMMADD = #{bcommadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLTTYPE = #{clttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGTYPE = #{orgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGEBANKCODE = #{managebankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORTDRTFG = #{fortdrtfg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGCODE = #{regcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
